Package socialmedia

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialmedia.EmptyPost
      • socialmedia.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionablePost, Endorsement
    public abstract class Post
extends EmptyPost
    The post class is used to create objects that represent users posts on social media
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int currentId
      A public attribute Integer that stores the id of the next post to be created
      protected int ID
      A protected constant attribute Integer used to store the id of a post this is unique to the post
      protected Account poster
      A protected attribute Account used to store the account who posted the post

                        throws NotActionablePostException
        This method checks if a post is actionable
        Parameters:
        post - the post being checked
        Returns:
        true if actionable
        Throws:
        NotActionablePostException - when trying to act upon an non-actionable post
